doc.title: 'Columbia' and 'Defender' Rounding Stake-Boat
doc.plot: "A remarkably fine picture of a trial race between the Columbia and Defender. The boats are very close together and come directly towards the camera at high speed well heeled over by the wind. They turn on the mark in the picture and start off on the last leg of the race. This is one of the best yacht racing pictures we have ever been privileged to make."

"A remarkably fine picture of a trial race between the Columbia and Defender. The boats are very close together and come directly towards the camera at high speed well heeled over by the wind. They turn on the mark in the picture and start off on the last leg of the race. This is one of the best yacht racing pictures we have ever been privileged to make."
